inclusion.criterion: treatment with inhaled steroids met as per NICE guidelines
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: on treatment with either Symbicort or Seretide at the time of recruitment
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: recruited patients are able to understand and co-operate with the study conduct
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: recruited patients are willing to give written consent
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: participation in any other study within 4 weeks prior
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: alcohol or drug abuse will interfere with assessment
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: inability to follow study procedures self explanatory
inclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: concomitant disease which may interfere with the study procedure or evaluation
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: recent exacerbation of COPD within the last 8 weeks will interfere with assessment
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: use of oral steroids within the last 2 months will interfere with assessment
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has systemic mastocytosis, but no other concomitant diseases mentioned. No recent exacerbation of COPD or use of oral steroids in the past 2 months.
